sentences.en: Do not tease roaming dogs and Macaque ( monkey ). Do not run and always keep calm.
sentences.cn: 不要去刺激流浪狗和猴子, 保持镇定及避免奔跑.

sentences.en: Do not tease roaming dogs and macaque.
sentences.cn: 不要去欺负流浪狗和短尾猿。

sentences.en: Now, two macaque monkeys may have helped MIT researchers solve the time tracking puzzle.
sentences.cn: 现在，两只短尾猿或许可以帮助这些研究人员们解开时间谜团。

sentences.en: Old World monkeys: guenon; baboon; colobus monkey; langur; macaque ; mandrill ; mangabey; patas; proboscis monkey.
sentences.cn: 旧域猴：长尾猴; 狒狒; 疣猴; 叶猴; 短尾猴; 山魈;白眉猴; 长鼻猴.

sentences.en: Small macaque is clever and outstanding, like maths again.
sentences.cn: 小猕猴聪明过人, 又喜欢数学.

trans.tran_cn: 恒河猴，猕猴，叟猴，猢狲，狙
trans.tran_en: any of various Old World monkeys of the genus Macaca, inhabiting wooded or rocky regions of Asia and Africa
